alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 02 at 5:59PM EDT until further notice by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...The Florida Keys in Monroe County. * WHEN...From Midnight EDT tonight through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall is expected across the Florida Keys as a tropical system moves through the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
